h:xml.ns2:parsedDocument:
Xml-Beispiel Xml-Uebung
Features List:
1. XML Declaration - 2. Parsed XML Document
XML Declaration Feature Description:
- XML Declaration is included at the top of the file to specify the version and character encoding of the document. - It also includes any additional metadata that may be used by the parser.
Parsed XML Document Feature Description:
- Parsed XML document is the final result of parsing an XML file. - The parsed document includes validation status, element count and result code for further analysis. - It can have different types of result codes and values for analysis.
Alice Bob Meeting Don't forget our meeting at 2pm!
